title: First Time I Get Banned Is A 14 Day Ban
body:
I recently got banned for toxic communication in a normal game. Now I'm not saying i was justified or not toxic but I have been playing this game for 2.5-3 years and i have not ever been banned nor have I ever received LPQ. But after this game one player who was being what I perceived to be just as toxic reported me and I did not bother to report him. 5 minutes later I am banned for 14 days. This is my first instance of being toxic and now you are telling me the next instance could be a perma ban. I fee like this is extremely harsh especially 90% of what i said that game was in response top the other player being toxic as well.
My coms that game were as follows:
Game 1
HavocCraze: kys
HavocCraze: you didnt auto him when i went in
HavocCraze: no u didnt
HavocCraze: he didnt have a ring around him
HavocCraze: stun?
HavocCraze: 4 mid btw
HavocCraze: 5
HavocCraze: no'
HavocCraze: no
HavocCraze: no
HavocCraze: no
HavocCraze: bronze/silver vall
HavocCraze: they dont have long death timers
HavocCraze: stfu
HavocCraze: u are so bad at macro
HavocCraze: brand
HavocCraze: wp
HavocCraze: wp
HavocCraze: i go oom too fast
HavocCraze: kys
HavocCraze: you r silver
HavocCraze: finish baron next time
HavocCraze: i have ga
HavocCraze: idiot brand
HavocCraze: pinging me
HavocCraze: dont ping me you bronze player
HavocCraze: wait he actually is bronze
HavocCraze: wtf
HavocCraze: im plat kys

This game as I look back on what i said has what i believe to be 4 lines of toxic behavior and I apologize and I understand kys is a very harsh this to say. However, the player I was talking to was spam pinging me throughout  the entire game, asking for the other player to buy him a skin, attempting to steal my jungle camps, and picking me out saying things such as "bad jg" "usless Kha". I understand reactions like this are not justified and I should have just muted the player and finished the game honorably. But a 14 day ban after a history of being an honorable player and being one for the first players that I saw to receive honor lvl 3 even among streamers made me feel like this ban unfair. On my personal bias I would say I should not have been banned at all, but reflecting on my communicaiton this game I would understand a 1-2 day ban or a chat restriction for 10-20 games. However, for my first offence, no history of being dishonorable, and only 4 lines of toxicity a 14 day ban seems unjustified.

What you are given is a SAMPLE of what got you punished.  It just so happened to be the most severe.  However, most if not all people do not get punishment just for the one game.  You may had accumulate toxicity meter over time and this is the one that pushed it way over the line.

When people complain about their punishment, you must remember that what you are given are 1 to 3 SAMPLES of your toxic games.  It is not necessary the ONLY toxic games you have on your record.  If Rito sent out every single games that is part of what built up your toxic meter, we'd probably be here reading until the sun come down.

People bite down too hard on the SAMPLES they are given and claim that it is not THAT toxic, but many failed to comprehend that they most likely have OTHERS toxic games on records Rito did not sent them.

I am just concerned how it went to a 14 day ban right away. I would have changed my behavior if they gave me the normal order which is 10 games chat ban, 20 games chat ban, 14 day ban, perma ban. Instead riot skipped those previous tiers.
